short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take and organize notes from ChatGPT conversations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance Your ChatGPT Conversations with ChatGPT Notes! 🗒️

Struggling to keep track of key insights during long conversations? ChatGPT Notes lets you save, organize, and manage chat responses directly within the ChatGPT interface. No need to switch between apps—just click, save, and organize your ideas in real-time.

Features:
🚀 One-Click Saving: Easily capture important chat responses with the custom icon.
🗂 Folder Organization: Structure your notes with folders—create, rename, or delete as needed.
📥 Export Options: Download notes as PDFs or DOC files for easy sharing or storage.
✨ Persistent Storage: Your notes stay intact across sessions with local storage.


How It Works:

Install the extension and open ChatGPT.
Use the 🚀 icon next to responses to save notes.
Select or create folders on the fly to organize your notes.
Click the “View Notes” button anytime to access your saved notes.
Export your notes as PDF or DOC files when needed.

Why Use ChatGPT Notes?

📌 No need to copy-paste—save notes directly from ChatGPT.
📌 Stay productive and build your own knowledge base with ease.
📌 Organize ideas and insights without losing focus.

Get Started Today!
Download ChatGPT Notes and take control of your conversations!
